name: Stone Peaks
description:
Overview

An RPG Story-driven sandbox adventure set in a fantasy world. You awaken into a world where you cannot recall anything about your life before this. It feels as if you have been given a second chance at life. You soon realise you must battle your way up and gain as much experience and prestige as you can to enable you to venture deeper into the world.

You notice you have a natural skill for combat and gathering you have a lot to learn but you have the making of a true hero.

Now go venture out find yourself learn about the world that is yet unbeknown to you good luck adventurer!

Features:

  • Unlimited Level ups
  • Stat upgrades
  • Large open world
  • Progressive Non-Combat Skills
  • Interactive Cursors
  • Colour Blind accessible Text

Controls:

  • Movement = W,A,S,D Keys
  • Left_Shift = Dashing
  • Interaction Key = E Key      

           (Gathering/Talking to NPCS)

  • Progress Through Dialog = Enter Key
  • Attack = Left Mouse Button

           Use Directional Keys(Movement Keys) To Attack in your desired direction)

           (Hold for longer attacks)

  • - Quit/Pause = Escape Key

Supported Platforms:

Windows 7, Windows 10

Requirements:

  • 800-megahertz (MHz) 32-bit (x86) processor or 800-MHz 64-bit (x64) processor.
  • 512 megabytes (MB) of system memory. 
  • DirectX 9-class graphics card.
  • 32 MB of graphics memory.
  • Windows 7 +

This game is still very much in the early stages so it may contain bugs.
